title: Auto-first calibration for single static camera (emit metrics)
scope: Implement an auto-first calibration flow that attempts to fit pitch mapping from markings observations.
Emit calibration metrics required for deterministic gating.
Fail explicitly and preserve trust-first semantics (no guessing).
acceptance: Calibration outputs a non-placeholder diagnostics/calibration.json with metrics.
Calibration returns explicit failure reasons when auto-fit is insufficient.
Metrics are stable/deterministic for a fixed fixture input.

deliverables.title: Auto-fit calibration implementation and diagnostics
acceptance: Auto-fit emits metrics and failure reasons deterministically.

subtasks.title: Harden auto-fit and ensure required metrics are emitted.
done_when: diagnostics/calibration.json includes required metrics for gating.
Auto-fit failure reasons are explicit and actionable.
